p: Finally, we evaluated the proportion of RSV-infected subjects who adequately received palivizumab-based prophylaxis before the onset of their ALRIs according to the 1999 marketing authorization of palivizumab by the European Medicines Agency (EMA) [ 11], the 2007 guidelines of the French Health Authority (HAS), [ 8] and the 2014 guidance for palivizumab use of the American Academy of Pediatrics (AAP) [ 12].
